experiment.Word

experiment   
 

Uses of Word in experiment
 

Methods in experiment that return Word
 Word TestList.get(char category, char wordType)
          Returns a word with the given attributes
 Word StudyList.get(int index)
          Returns the word at the given index
 Word TestList.get(Word word)
          Gets the given word from the test list
 Word Trial.getFoilWord()
          Returns the foil word of this trial
 Word Trial.getTargetWord()
          Returns the target word of this trial
 Word[] Trial.getTrialWords()
          Returns an array representation of the trial words
 

Methods in experiment that return types with arguments of type Word
 java.util.ArrayList<Word> TestList.getAfoils()
          Returns an array representation of the category A foils in this TestList
 java.util.ArrayList<Word> TestList.getAtargets()
          Returns an array representation of the category A targets in this TestList
 java.util.ArrayList<Word> TestList.getBfoils()
          Returns an array representation of the category B foils in this TestList
 java.util.ArrayList<Word> TestList.getBtargets()
          Returns an array representation of the category B targets in this TestList
 

Methods in experiment with parameters of type Word
 void TestList.add(Word word)
          Adds this word to the testlist
 void StudyList.add(Word word)
          Adds the given word to the StudyList
 void ListSorter.add(Word word, int index)
          Adds this word to the listsorter
 void ListSorter.chooseCategory(Word word, int index)
          Chooses a category for this word, either 'a' or 'b'
 void ListSorter.chooseWordType(Word word, int index)
          Chooses the word type, either target or foil, for the given word and index
 boolean Word.equals(Word word)
          Returns true if the given word equals this word
 Word TestList.get(Word word)
          Gets the given word from the test list
 int TestList.indexOf(Word word)
          Returns the index of this word in the test list
 int StudyList.indexOf(Word word)
          Returns the index of the given word
